page.title: 07THE SCHOOL DAY
page.content: The school day begins at 9 o'clock in the morning.The children learn many subjects including reading,mathematics craft,and games. Eeach lesson lasts a different length of time but the children do have a break at10.30 AM until 11.00AM,and dinner time lasts for 1hour starting at 12.15. In the afternoon lessons consist of many activities associated with the above subjects.The school day ends at 3.30pm for the infants and 4.00pm for the junior children. Occasionally the children go out on school visits to places such as the local farm or other places of interest. Because this is the only primary school in the area some have to travel from surrounding settlements like Twyford.
